title: Equitas Small Finance Bank clocks 35% deposits growth, bucks sectoral trend
description: Equitas Small Finance Bank, with a priority sector focus, achieved a 35.4% year-on-year deposit growth to Rs 37524 crore by the end of June, surpassing the sectoral average of 12%. Advances increased 17.8% to Rs 34872 crore, although the CASA ratio fell to 31% due to faster term deposits growth. Provisional figures submitted to stock exchanges confirmed these results.
